member.name: T:WindowsApplication1.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WindowsApplication1.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WindowsApplication1.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:WindowsApplication1.XC2DataType
member.summary: Field values present in an XC2 save file.

member.name: T:WindowsApplication1.XC2Data
member.summary: Information required to read an XC2 save file.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.HexEditor.ReadAsDecimal(System.Byte[],WindowsApplication1.HexDataInfo)
member.summary: Starts at the offset given, then converts each byte into a hex string.
member.param: The offset to look for and the number of bytes to read.
member.returns: The read bytes, converted into a usable value for the end-user.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.HexEditor.ReadHexData(System.Byte[],WindowsApplication1.HexDataInfo)
member.summary: Starts at the offset given, then converts each byte into a hex string.
member.param: The offset to look for and the number of bytes to read.
member.returns: Each byte read as a hexadecimal string.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.HexEditor.ReadHexDataAtOffset(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts at the offset given, then converts each byte into a hex string.
member.param: The number of bytes to read.
member.returns: Each byte read as a hexadecimal string.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.HexEditor.SaveDecimalValue(System.Byte[],WindowsApplication1.HexDataInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: Modifies the provided data with the given value.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.HexEditor.SaveHexData(System.Byte[],WindowsApplication1.HexDataInfo,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Modifies the provided byte array with the values provided.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.HexEditor.SaveHexDataAtOffset(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Modifies the provided byte array with the values provided.

member.summary: Whether a file is loaded and that file can be edited.

member.summary: The value being edited.

member.name: P:WindowsApplication1.MainForm.SelectedHexDataInfo
member.summary: Info about the currently selected field.

member.summary: Handles setup for the app.

member.summary: Changes the field being edited.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.MainForm.OpenFile(System.Windows.Forms.Button,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Presents the user with an open file dialog, then loads the file they specify.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.MainForm.SaveFile(System.Windows.Forms.Button,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the currently loaded file, overwriting the currently selected file.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.MainForm.SaveUpdatedFieldValue(System.Windows.Forms.Button,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the value on the UI back to bytes in memory.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.MainForm.SaveFileAs(System.Windows.Forms.Button,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Presents the user with a save file dialog, then saves the currently loaded copy of the save file to the location they specify.

member.name: M:WindowsApplication1.MainForm.RaisePropertyChanged(System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Tell the UI to update after a value was programatically changed. If this is not called, the UI will not know a value has updated.

member.name: T:WindowsApplication1.HexDataInfo
member.summary: Represents a section of data in the save file.
